column3: The invisible gaseous substance surrounding the earth; a mixture mainly of oxygen and nitrogen.
The length of time that a person has lived or a thing has existed.
A counter across which alcoholic drinks or refreshments are served.
A piece of furniture for sleep or rest typically a framework with a mattress and coverings.
A small domesticated carnivorous mammal with soft fur is widely kept as a pet or for catching mice.
The civil force responsible for the prevention and detection of crime and the maintenance of public order.
A domesticated carnivorous mammal that has a barking howling or whining voice.
A wild animal's lair or habitation.
A supernatural creature of folk tales typically represented in human form with pointed ears with magical powers.
An indefinite and very long period of time - often a period exaggerated for humorous or rhetorical effect.
A carnivorous mammal of the dog family with a pointed muzzle and bushy tail proverbial for its cunning.
The short; fine; soft hair of certain animals.
A superhuman being or spirit worshiped as having power over nature or human fortunes.
A clear alcoholic spirit distilled from grain or malt and flavored with juniper berries.
Meat from the upper part of a pig's leg salted and dried or smoked.
A female bird especially of a domestic fowl.
Irritate; annoy.
Frozen water - a brittle transparent crystalline solid.
A rapid stream of liquid or gas forced out of a small opening.
A quick and sharp blow especially with the fist.
One's family and relations.
One's range of knowledge or sight.
The system of rules used to regulate actions of concerned members.
An intentionally false statement.
Combine or put together to form one substance or mass.
A diagrammatic representation of an area of land or sea showing physical features - landmark / cities / roads.
A divice made of fabric or rope stitched together used to catch things such as fish / bug.
Not existing before; made / introduced / discovered recently or now for the first time.
Fantasy literature/games - a member of an imaginary race of humanlike creatures characterized as ugly; warlike; malevolent.
A naturally occurring solid material from which a metal or valuable mineral can be profitably extracted.
A domestic or tamed animal kept for companionship or pleasure.
A joke exploiting the the fact that there are words which sound alike but have different meanings.
In the capacity of; as being.
The leaves of an Arabian shrub which are chewed (or drunk as an infusion) as a stimulant.
An alcoholic liquor distilled from sugar-cane residues or molasses.
An uncastrated male sheep.
The expanse of salt water that covers most of the earth's surface and surrounds its landmasses.
A person who secretly collects and reports information on the activities and plans of an enemy or competitor.
A label attached to someone or something for the purpose of identification or to give other information.
A compulsory contribution to state revenue levied by the government.
A tall and rounded vase with a base used for storing the ashes of a cremated person.
Take / hold / deploy (something) as a means of accomplishing a purpose or achieving a result; employ.
A solemn promise.
Make a careful and critical examination of (something).
A state of armed conflict between different nations or states or different groups within a nation or state.
A bowl-shaped frying pan used typically in Chinese cooking.
The fourteenth letter of the Greek alphabet.
(Chinese philosophy) the passive female principle of the universe associated with earth; dark; and cold.
A large domesticated wild ox with shaggy hair; humped shoulders; and large horns.
Destroy or obliterate.
Move at high speed.
The long threadlike part of a nerve cell along which impulses are conducted from the cell body to other cells.
A continuous or prolonged dull pain in a part of one's body.
Of a color intermediate between green and violet as of the sky or sea on a sunny day.
A group of binary digits or bits (usually eight) operated on as a unit.
An item of soft sweet food made from a mixture of flour; shortening; eggs; sugar; and other ingredients
An association or organization dedicated to a particular interest or activity.
A state of stunned confusion or bewilderment.
Score by shooting the ball down through the basket with the hands above the rim.
Heroic or grand in scale or character. (Informal) Particularly impressive or remarkable.
A large exhibition.
The development of events beyond a person's control regarded as determined by a supernatural power.
People in general.
A form of play or sport especially a competitive one played according to rules and decided by skill; strength; or luck.
A spiral or vortex.
Cut with rough or heavy blows.
A religious song or poem of praise to a god.
A strong; hard magnetic silvery-gray metal; the chemical element of atomic number 26
An individual article or unit; especially one that is part of a list; collection; or set.
Heavy twilled cotton cloth especially denim.
A sport of unarmed combat derived from jujitsu. It involves using holds and leverage to unbalance the opponent.
A hardy cabbage of a variety which produces erect stems with large leaves and no compact head.
A title given to rulers and officials in central Asia; Afghanistan; and certain other Muslim countries.
Jump or spring a long way; to a great height; or with great force.
A large tawny-colored cat that lives in prides found in Africa and northwestern India.
An entity who wield magical power.
A network of paths and hedges designed as a puzzle through which one has to find a way.
Newly received or noteworthy information especially about recent or important events.
A nuclear weapon.
The characteristic grunting sound of a pig.
A large toothed whale with distinctive black-and-white markings and a prominent dorsal fin.
Reach a highest point; either of a specified value or at a specified time.
Of a color intermediate between red and white as of coral or salmon.
Characteristic of quadruple or quadraphonic.
A test of knowledge especially a brief; informal test given to students.
Plentiful; abundant.
A flower that is widely given as simbol of romantic and love
Having an acid taste like lemon or vinegar.
A Japanese form of heavyweight wrestling.
Domesticate (an animal).
Archaic or dialect form of you; as the singular subject of a verb.
Archaic term for to/until.
A person who uses or operates something especially a computer or other machine.
An endorsement on a passport allowing the holder to enter/leave/stay for a specified period of time in a country.
Completely empty.
An alcoholic drink made from fermented grape juice.
A strip of porous material up which liquid fuel is drawn by capillary action to the flame in a candle/lamp/lighter.
(Ancient Greek and Roman architecture) acovered portico; as a promenade. A garden walk planted with trees.
A small and green humanoid alien first appearing in the 1980 film The Empire Strikes Back.
A circular tent of felt or skins on a collapsible framework used by nomads in Mongolia - Siberia - Turkey.
Scrape off the outer colored part of the peel of (a piece of citrus fruit) for use as flavoring.
Great energy or enthusiasm in pursuit of a cause or an objective.
Regard with disgust and hatred.
A lacquered or decorated wooden Japanese lunchbox.
A small shelter or house made of wood and situated in a wild or remote area.
Containing or made from milk.
The third planet in the Solar System.
A Muslim (or loosely a Hindu) religious ascetic who lives solely on alms.
An evil spirit or phantom especially one supposed to rob graves and feed on dead bodies.
A rapacious monster described as having a woman's head and body of a bird with wings and claws.
A block of steel/gold/silver/other metal in a typically oblong shape.
A person who is fond of joking.
A Japanese form of fencing with two-handed bamboo swords.
A passage/movement/composition marked to be performed in a slow tempo and with a dignified style.
The power of apparently influencing the course of events by using mysterious or supernatural forces.
A characteristic high-pitched sound uttered by a horse.
General or widespread hatred or disgust directed toward someone as a result of their actions.
A person who operates the flying controls of an aircraft.
A unit of liquid capacity equal to a quarter of a gallon or two pints.
A rhythmic dance with Spanish and African elements originating in Cuba.
A heavy cavalry sword with a curved blade and a single cutting edge.
A singing voice between baritone and alto or countertenor. The highest of the ordinary adult male range.
In/relating to/characteristic of a town or city.
A person who does not eat or use animal products.
A vehicle used for transporting goods or another specified purpose.
(of an environment or habitat) containing little moisture; very dry.
A medium-sized sailboat equipped for cruising or racing.
An African wild horse with black-and-white stripes and an erect mane.
